analyser
Class AuxiliaryVerb

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--analyser.AuxiliaryVerb
public class AuxiliaryVerb
extends java.lang.Object

The class Auxillary contains methods for checking whether the input ends with an auxillary. If so, removes it from the input and store it as auxillary in output
